title: S15 Ep106: Deceptive Gods: Confronting the Divine & Demonic
itunes:title: Deceptive Gods: Confronting the Divine & Demonic
description:
Darkness Radio faces off with Deceptive Gods: Confronting the Divine & Demonic with Lorne J. Therrien Sr.

Dave & Tim journey down a mystical path with their guest today as he describes his experiences in the comforting embrace of angels, his gift of visions and as he delves into the deepest secrets of the unseen, bringing to light, the true nature of its mysterious inhabitants. 

Not everything is light and wonderment though as Lorne discusses darker-than-night hooded shadows that would attack him, along with encounters of the Succubi that refused to let him go.

Get his book here: https://amzn.to/36Wd6bI
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
